actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Navy from requiring an employment contract in excess of one year for civilian employees at Adak Naval Station.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Navy from requiring any individual who is to perform services as a civilian employee at the United States Naval Station, Adak, Alaska, to enter into an employment contract for a term of service in excess of one year.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Navy from requiring an employment contract in excess of one year for civilian employees at Adak Naval Station.
